mapper.insert: insert into tb_question (tittle, description, create_date, last_modify_date, creator, commit_count, view_count, like_count, tag) values (#{tittle},#{description},#{createDate},#{lastModifyDate}, #{creator}, #{commitCount}, #{viewCount}, #{likeCount}, #{tag})
mapper.select: select tittle, description, create_date, last_modify_date, creator, commit_count, view_count, like_count, tag, B.name, B.avatar_url from tb_question A left join tb_user B on A.creator = B.account_id
